column5: I'm looking for a northern Sask. drive in resort that I can use my own boat at. Any recommendations? thanks
Tobin Lake....a true world class walleye/NP fishery offering a great opportunity for a PB.www.tobinlakeresort.com/main.htm
Now that is a nice clean web site!

I have fished tobin in the fall. That is my plan to run up this summer to try it then. I was just wondering if there was anything further north that was even more remote that would be as good. there probably isn't.
Sure there is, if you're willing to drive to Southend Saskatchewan. http://www.reindeerlake.com/http://www.troutcamp.com/
Check out Davin Lake Lodge. Outstanding place to go.

Been to Rendeer Lake Trout Camp a number of times at various times of the season. You can't go wrong for the price. Spring you can catch 40"+ northerns all day long and in the fall the lake trout spawn is awesome and it is normal to catch 100 trout in a day.
